page.title: 16OUR LOCAL POLICEMAN
page.content: P.C.Moon has been here in Coningsby for 2 years 7 months. His name is Derek and he is 31 years old,married with 3 children. He has been in the police force 12 years. His number is 159. In the car,a Vauxhall Chevette; the police man carries a fire extinguish- er,torch, 2 yellow jackets for accidents in the fog or dark. He carries cones, signs, and has 3 radio aerials linking to the police H.Q. at Nettleham, Lincoln.He is employed by Lincolnshire County Council. The original station was on Silver Street and Dog Dyke Road, Coningsby before {1900}.They moved in{1952}to Park Lane. He covers Tattershall Bridge to East Kirkby,and Wood Enderby to Tumby Woodside. He has 7 days off out of each 28 days.
